name: Filtering profanity for valid texts after adding new invalid profanity string

testSteps.description: 1: Filtering profanity for valid texts after adding new invalid profanity string ({text=this is awesome, format=json, profanity String=this,some, replacement string=$, error=Invalid User Replacement Text})

children.description: When Siva requests a "this is awesome" after filtering using new "this,some" by replacing with "$" in "json"
Filter input text this is awesome by adding new text this,some by replacing $ in response format json

restQuery.responseHeaders:
Content-Type: application/json
Access-Control-Allow-Origin: *
X-Cloud-Trace-Context: d3a0fdbd93178da8de528ab88b9a2b98
Date: Sun, 18 Jul 2021 21:27:24 GMT
Server: Google Frontend
Content-Length: 41

children.description: Then he should be shown an "Invalid User Replacement Text" message in requested "json"
Validate response 'error' Invalid User Replacement Text in format json

testSteps.description: 2: Filtering profanity for valid texts after adding new invalid profanity string ({text=this is awesome, format=xml, profanity String=this, replacement string=twentycharacterlimitcheck, error=User Replacement Text Exceeds Limit of 20 Characters.})

children.description: When Siva requests a "this is awesome" after filtering using new "this" by replacing with "twentycharacterlimitcheck" in "xml"
Filter input text this is awesome by adding new text this by replacing twentycharacterlimitcheck in response format xml

restQuery.responseBody:
<PurgoMalum xmlns="http://www.purgomalum.com">
  <error>User Replacement Text Exceeds Limit of 20 Characters.</error>
</PurgoMalum>

children.description: Then he should be shown an "User Replacement Text Exceeds Limit of 20 Characters." message in requested "xml"
Validate response 'error' User Replacement Text Exceeds Limit of 20 Characters. in format xml

testSteps.description: 3: Filtering profanity for valid texts after adding new invalid profanity string ({text=this is awesome, format=plain, profanity String=a,a,a,a,a,a,a,a,a,a,a, replacement string=addwordlimitcheck, error=User Black List Exceeds Limit of 10 Words.})

children.description: When Siva requests a "this is awesome" after filtering using new "a,a,a,a,a,a,a,a,a,a,a" by replacing with "addwordlimitcheck" in "plain"
Filter input text this is awesome by adding new text a,a,a,a,a,a,a,a,a,a,a by replacing addwordlimitcheck in response format plain
